doc:
Kieran Culkin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kieran_Culkin 0 Kieran Kyle Culkin (born September 30, 1982) is an American actor. He began his career as a child actor, acting alongside his older brother Macaulay in the Home Alone franchise (1990–1992) His breakout role in Igby Goes Down (2002) received critical acclaim and he was nominated for a Best Actor Golden Globe Award, as well as winning a Critics' Choice Movie Award and Satellite Award. He has also acted on the stage, most notably in several productions of the Kenneth Lonergan play This Is Our Youth. In 2015, he portrayed Rye Gerhardt in the second season of the FX series Fargo. He currently plays Roman Roy in the HBO series Succession. Kieran_Kyle_Culkin ( born September_30_,_1982 ) is an_American_actor . He began his_career as a_child_actor , acting alongside his_older_brother_Macaulay in the_Home_Alone_franchise_(_1990 – 1992 ) His_breakout_role in Igby Goes Down_(_2002_) received critical_acclaim and he was_nominated for a_Best_Actor_Golden_Globe_Award , as_well_as winning a_Critics '_Choice_Movie_Award_and_Satellite_Award . He has_also_acted on the_stage , most_notably in several_productions of the_Kenneth_Lonergan play This Is Our_Youth . In 2015 , he portrayed Rye_Gerhardt in the_second_season of the_FX_series_Fargo . He currently plays Roman_Roy in the_HBO_series_Succession .
